body: When will the fucking translations come out ಠ_ʖಠ
is this a spn off or a part 3 of "miya-chan" series of kaenuco?

@sedoboi -​ Yes, you are right. This is the prequel and it is just only the first part, there will be second part soon according to the author. For some who want to know story but can't read japanese, this is what I can get for translating by myself.

Miyako Kojou, Miya for short, recently became 3rd middle schooler when her parents disappeared in overseas. Because of that, she had to move living with her uncle. I don't why she was kinda rude to her uncle, probably her attitude but her uncle actually installed hidden cameras on her for his own pleasure. But as you can see, Miya found out about it and she was really angry. Soher uncle lost his patience and threaten to kick her out of the house, making her become homeless. Miya didn't want to be like that, so her uncle offered her to pay living expense with her body for one year, until she graduate from middel school. As we know, she agreed and soon became his sex slave obeying his extreme rules that made her slowy becoming sex-addicted.

For those who don't know, this is probably the prequel. Cause in the other "Mika-chan" chapters, Mika's already having sex with her uncle, even paying him to do it with her. In here, Mika hated him at the start, so it very well might be a prequel.

In case of people confused, this is the prequel to 1st and 2nd book. This one is the "1st Volume" of her training in the past and yes, there will be 2nd volume continued to this, according to the author.

Imagine what Miya had been through in this volume is really extreme enough, now imagine for what will happen to her in 2nd volume... Yes, it will show her slowly becoming sex-addicted.
